trans-unit.source: Implements error trapping on the asynchronous batch work that is submitted by the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Activity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 提交的异步批处理工作上的实现错误捕获<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Activity"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: IAsyncErrorNotify is used to implement error trapping on the asynchronous batch work that is submitted by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity> object.
trans-unit.target: IAsyncErrorNotify 用于提交的异步批处理工作上实现错误捕获<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity>对象。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity>

trans-unit.source: Implement this interface on the object that is passed in the call to <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall%2A> on the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity> object.
trans-unit.target: 在调用中传递的对象上实现此接口<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall%2A>上<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity>对象。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall%2A> determines if an error occurred in batch work that is running asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall%2A>确定在以异步方式运行的批处理工作中是否发生了错误。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall%2A>

trans-unit.source: This interface enables you to be informed of errors that occur in asynchronous batch work, and the process will terminate (failfast) on any unrecoverable error.
trans-unit.target: 此接口，可在异步批处理工作中发生的错误通知并在有任何不可恢复的错误，则进程将终止 (failfast)。

trans-unit.source: For information about failfast, see the "Fault Isolation and Failfast Policy" topic in the Platform SDK in MSDN.
trans-unit.target: Failfast 有关的信息，请参阅 MSDN 中的平台 SDK 中的"错误隔离和 Failfast 策略"主题。

trans-unit.source: Handles errors for asynchronous batch work.
trans-unit.target: 处理异步批处理工作的错误。

trans-unit.source: This method should be implemented to gracefully handle errors that occur when batch work is running asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 此方法应实现妥善处理以异步方式运行批处理工作时出现的错误。

trans-unit.source: Because the process terminates (failfast) on any unrecoverable error, without this method there is no way of knowing when errors occur in asynchronous batch work.
trans-unit.target: 因为在进程终止 (failfast) 在有任何不可恢复的错误，而无需此方法没有无法知道错误发生在异步批处理工作中。

trans-unit.source: The process also terminates when this method returns an error as its return value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回作为其返回值出错时，也会终止进程。

trans-unit.source: The batch work itself is implemented in <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IServiceCall.OnCall%2A>, and it is run asynchronously by calling <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在中实现批处理工作自身<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IServiceCall.OnCall%2A>，并通过调用<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall%2A>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall%2A>以异步方式运行</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.IServiceCall.OnCall%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method supports the standard return values `E_FAIL`, `E_INVALIDARG`, and `E_OUTOFMEMORY`, as well as `S_OK`, which indicates the method call returned successfully.
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持标准的返回值`E_FAIL`， `E_INVALIDARG`，和`E_OUTOFMEMORY`，以及`S_OK`，指示方法调用成功返回。

trans-unit.source: The HRESULT of the error that occurred while the batch work was running asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 以异步方式运行的批处理工作时出现的错误的 HRESULT。
